channel.title: [R2]Naturez (Nature-Runecrafter)
channel.description:
[center][b]Original post: http://villavu.com/forum/showthread.php?p=818288[/b][/center]
[CENTER][size=26pt]Naturez (2.0)[/size]
[b][URL=http://stats.villavu.com/script/148]SRL Stats Page[/URL][/b]
[B][U]Description:[/U][/B] Naturez is the sister script to Astralz, designed to rapidly craft Nature runes. 2.1 features my newest script core (V3) and for speed and endurance. Newly added features are listed below.
[B][U]Features:[/U][/B] *Runecrafts Nature runes using the Burthorpe Bank-Chest *Accurate familiar detection and handling *Supports pouches / repair pouch spell *Pouch-Priority option available *Solid break system (By Echo_) with cool graphics! *World switching option (If enabled, switches worlds after every break) *SRL Stats *On-Screen progress report *Failsafes to ensure endurance
[B][U]How to use:[/U][/B] *Start at the Burthorpe bank chest with a [U]Games Necklace[/U] equipped *Have 1+ Nature runes in your [U]first[/U] inventory slot
[B][U]2.1 changes:[/U][/B] *Banking now done at the Burthorpe bank chest (Games necklaces required) *Bank procedures redone (Also now handles pending PINs) *Reflection-based familiar handling (This also means Summoning.Simba isn't neded, new system is internal within the script) *New-pouch handling system *Pouch Priority option added *Lost detection and correction
[B][U]For pouch use:[/U][/B] *You must have unlocked "Repair Pouch" spell from the Livid Farm activity *The pouches you use must be in your inventory *The runes to cast "Repair Pouch" spell must be in your inventory
[b]Suggested setup show below: (Red is required, yellow for using pouches)[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/uz19W.png[/img] [/CENTER]
[End note:] Naturez 2.1 is a cleaned up, sped up, and patched version of 2.0. I ran it smoothly for over 3 hours, no problems. If everybody else gets the same results as me then 2.1 will be the final release.
~Cheerz, Flight~

item.title: [R2]Naturez (Nature-Runecrafter)
item.dc:creator: @Wolf Wolf
item.description:
@Wolf wrote:

[center]Original post: http://villavu.com/forum/showthread.php?p=818288[/center]

[CENTER][size=26pt]Naturez (2.0)[/size]

SRL Stats Page

Description:
Naturez is the sister script to Astralz, designed to rapidly craft Nature runes. 2.1 features my newest script core (V3) and for speed and endurance. Newly added features are listed below.

Features:
*Runecrafts Nature runes using the Burthorpe Bank-Chest
*Accurate familiar detection and handling
*Supports pouches / repair pouch spell
*Pouch-Priority option available
*Solid break system (By Echo_) with cool graphics!
*World switching option (If enabled, switches worlds after every break)
*SRL Stats
*On-Screen progress report
*Failsafes to ensure endurance

How to use:
*Start at the Burthorpe bank chest with a Games Necklace equipped
*Have 1+ Nature runes in your first inventory slot

2.1 changes:
*Banking now done at the Burthorpe bank chest (Games necklaces required)
*Bank procedures redone (Also now handles pending PINs)
*Reflection-based familiar handling (This also means Summoning.Simba isn’t neded, new system is internal within the script)
*New-pouch handling system
*Pouch Priority option added
*Lost detection and correction

For pouch use:
*You must have unlocked “Repair Pouch” spell from the Livid Farm activity
*The pouches you use must be in your inventory
*The runes to cast “Repair Pouch” spell must be in your inventory

Suggested setup show below: (Red is required, yellow for using pouches)

[/CENTER]

[End note:]
Naturez 2.1 is a cleaned up, sped up, and patched version of 2.0. I ran it smoothly for over 3 hours, no problems. If everybody else gets the same results as me then 2.1 will be the final release.

~Cheerz, Flight~

Read full topic
